categoriesExplanation: The workout is primarily classified as 'Mat' with a score of 0.9 due to explicit mentions in the title and description of 'Floor Exercises' and phrases like 'Bodyweight floor exercises,' which indicate a central theme of exercises done on a mat. This category is less central but still relevant.
